td.content: s:a 45 YO white female presents with 7 months history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests, moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances and Mental Health. patient reports that she smokes once or twice daily denies any alcohol use o:Height 68 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

patient reports that she smokes once or twice daily denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances and moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests x 5 weeks. she is a 45 yr old F. she has a history of smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:patient presents with 3 years history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. pt also reports increased frequency of moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. patient is a f graphic designer aged 46 ys. o:Height 68 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:patient presents with progressive moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances for past 6 weeks. pt is a 46 yr old female graphic designer. o:Height 68 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day.
